channel.title: Devops on Coding notes
channel.description: Recent content in Devops on Coding notes

item.title: DevOps notes
item.description: Dotnet templates Testing locally Clone this repository Go into this directory Execute following command dotnet new -i .\templates\bkr.microservice This will install template for dotnet new usage Create directory for you microservice and go into this directory Type dotnet new bkr.microservice --name Cheese.Cake You have scaffolded new service. Distributing with package Execute dotnet pack from templates directory This will create package with templates in .\bin\Debug\Bkr.Template.Service.1.0.0.nupkg Run dotnet new -i .\bin\Debug\Bkr.Template.Service.1.0.0.nupkg This will install template for dotnet new usage Create directory for you microservice and go into this directory Type dotnet new bkr.
